experiences.title: SAP and Software Development Intern
description: Completed a focused 1:1 mentorship-based internship exploring SAP systems and architecture within an enterprise environment
Gained foundational understanding of SAP modules, system structure, and internal data flow
Learned about standard and custom table usage (e.g., MARA, Z-tables) and their role in managing business processes
Observed the integration of SAP APIs with frontend tools such as ASP.NET in ongoing internal projects
Developed awareness of SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) and modern approaches to cloud-based enterprise solutions

experiences.title: Mental Health Research Intern
experiences.company: Project: Lean on me (Non Profit) · Remote
description: Conducting research on adolescent mental health, with focus on developmental, academic, and social impact
Collaborating with a youth-led nonprofit to develop educational content for social media and future website launch

experiences.title: Social Media Content Creator
description: Building a faceless Instagram brand focused on making tech approachable and lifestyle-inspired for beginners and enthusiasts
Creating weekly carousel posts and tutorials on practical topics like web scraping, VSCode extensions, project planning, and career advice
Passionate about sharing tools, tips, and guides to help others level up their skills and productivity

experiences.title: Digital Operations Assistant
experiences.company: Go Logistics Limited · Derby, England · Remote
description: Supported early-stage company setup, including logo design and completing Companies House registration
Assisted with general admin tasks and provided PA-style support to founders
Currently planning the company's digital presence, including social media strategy and future website development
